description: This drink will cause instant relief while going down smooth. With hints of floral ingredients.May cause burping.
A light and vibrant drink that is a bit sour bit hits the right spot it got a lagoon green feel garnished with gummy worms.
Bright Green, like a glow stick, burns the throat and lips while drinking.
Sprinkle of Anti matter, on the rocks(space ice from Jupiter) with a touch of moon dust garnish
A cloudy wheat beer with hints of banana and clove, brewed by Herglic brewers on their aquatic homeworld.
A fruity ale with a tart cherry flavor and a hint of mischief, brewed by Kowakian monkey-lizards on their roaming starships.
A dark and robust porter with notes of chocolate and caramel, brewed by Pau'an monks in their shadowy temples on Utapau.
A strong ale with a bold flavor and a high alcohol content, brewed by Talz brewers in their frozen mountain retreats.
A light and bubbly ale with a hint of fruitiness and a clean, refreshing finish, brewed by Togrutan artisans during festive celebrations.
An effervescent blue concoction with hints of ionized plasma
A delicate combination of keratin and hemoglobin, this drink goes down like rotten milk. If that's your thing.
